thread.title: Hyderabad Police get specialised teams to gather clues | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Hyderabad Police get specialised teams to gather clues | Deccan Chronicle

author: PTI
title: Hyderabad Police get specialised teams to gather clues | Deccan Chronicle
text:
PTI | October 15, 2015, 19.46 pm Representational Image. (Photo: DC/File) Hyderabad: Telangana Director General of Police Anurag Sharma on Thursday launched 17 dedicated teams that will assist in crime scene preservation and gather vital clues.
The Scientific Clues Teams will assist the city police in securing crime scene and gathering vital clues that would help in solving cases, he said.
Each sub-division of the police has been provided with a vehicle fitted with scientific gadgets for processing crime scene and officials with expertise in forensic science, he added.
